ai-patthana15.70:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously,
ai-patthana15.70:0.3_0: perhaps I will do what is good,
ai-patthana15.70:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.70:2.1_0: go for refuge to the teaching, or to the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.70:3.1_0: Not knowing this teaching with reason, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.70:3.1_1: Not knowing this teaching with reason, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.70:3.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.70:4.1_0: or even a canopy covered in the same way.
ai-patthana15.70:5.1_0: It is a condition for the virtuous, not for the sake of defilement, and for the removal of the rejection of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.70:5.1_1: It is the condition for the virtuous, for the sake of non-existence, nor for the object of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana15.70:6.1_0: The two projecting the objects of plants next to the object interval between the two or three drops drawn out from the petals.
ai-patthana15.70:6.1_1: What is not the reason for two reasons.
